name: pwuninel

body.origin:
|- wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0))
-| wi(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))
-| wi(wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0))
-| wi(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))
-| wi(wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))
-| wi(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0))
-| wi(wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))
-| wi(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))

|- wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0))
-| wi(wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))
-| wi(wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))

|- wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0))
-| wi(wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)), wn(wcel(cpw(cuni(c0)), c0)))

comment: The power set of the union of a set does not belong to the set. This theorem provides a way of constructing a new set that doesn't belong to a given set. See also ~ pwuninel2 . (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
